verbs.description: [V: swindled] [ARG0: by contractor minneapolis couple] seeks justice a minneapolis couple says they were swindled out of thousands of dollars on a bathroom remodel project now the contractor at the center of the scandal is being accused of ripping off customers for beth knutson ponzi scheme pennsylvania department of labor and industry jeff danberg charles knutson labor and industry division minneapolis
